title: Extends provisions of chapter 57 of 2005 relating to the NYS nursing faculty loan forgiveness incentive program and NYS nursing faculty scholarship program
summary: Extends provisions relating to the NYS nursing faculty loan forgiveness incentive program and NYS nursing faculty scholarship program.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1584

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 11, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. GLICK -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Higher Education

       AN ACT to amend chapter 57 of the laws of 2005  amending  the  education
         law  relating  to  the New York state nursing faculty loan forgiveness
         incentive program and the New York state nursing  faculty  scholarship
         program, in relation to the effectiveness thereof

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 3 of part V of chapter  57  of  the  laws  of  2005
    2  amending the education law relating to the New York state nursing facul-
    3  ty  loan  forgiveness  incentive  program and the New York state nursing
    4  faculty scholarship program, as added by section 4 of part D of  chapter
    5  63 of the laws of 2005, is amended to read as follows:
    6    S  3.  This  act  shall  take  effect on the same date and in the same
    7  manner as Part H of [a chapter of the laws of 2005  amending  the  labor
    8  law  and  other  laws relating to implementing the state fiscal plan for
    9  the 2005-2006 state fiscal year, as proposed in legislative bill numbers
   10  S.3667 and A.6841, takes effect] THIS ACT; provided that section two  of
   11  this  act  shall  take effect on the same date and in the same manner as
   12  Part I of [a chapter of the laws of 2005  amending  the  labor  law  and
   13  other  laws relating to implementing the state fiscal plan for the 2005-
   14  2006 state fiscal year, as proposed in legislative bill  numbers  S.3667
   15  and  A.6841,  takes effect] THIS ACT; and provided further that this act
   16  shall expire and be deemed repealed on June 30, [2010] 2016.
   17    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07193-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 57 of the laws of 2005 amending the education law relating to the New York state nursing faculty loan forgiveness incentive program and the New York state nursing faculty scholarship program, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
